the : 3661
book was generated -> by : 1
was generated by -> lord : 1
generated by lord -> converter : 1
by lord converter -> version : 1
lord converter version -> lord : 1
converter version lord -> kiron : 1
version lord kiron -> you : 1
lord kiron you -> killed : 1
kiron you killed -> you : 1
you killed you -> dead : 1
you killed you -> had : 1
killed you dead -> make : 1
you dead make -> that : 1
dead make that -> being : 1
make that being -> undead : 1
that being undead -> just : 1
being undead just -> ask : 1
undead just ask -> thomas : 1
just ask thomas -> waking : 1
ask thomas waking -> up : 1
thomas waking up -> after : 1
waking up after -> a : 1
up after a -> fantastic : 1
after a fantastic -> night : 1
